question: World Ocean Summit 2018 held in __________.
explanation: The World Ocean Summit 2018 was held in Riviera Maya, Mexico. This was the fifth World Ocean Summit. It was hosted by the Economist Group. Over 360 leaders from government, industry, multilateral organisations, scientific community and civil society all over the world took part in the World Ocean Summit 2018. Problems related to the world is seas and solutions to protect ocean resources were discussed in the summit.
